nodes.text: The Dark Times is an expansion set for Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Miniatures game based on the Dark Times comics, released on January 26, 2010. The booster cover art was done by Terese Nielsen.

For over a thousand generations, the Jedi Knights were guardians of peace and justice in the Old Republic. But the Jedi have fallen, and sinister forces control the galaxy... the dark times are here! Re-enact and create your own battles nestled between Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith and Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope with the likes of Chewbacca, A'Sharad Hett, Major Veers, IG-88, Boushh, and other gritty heroes and ruthless villains from the Star Wars universe with this 40-figure Star Wars Miniatures expansion set offered in boosters containing seven random, pre-painted, plastic miniatures complete with stat cards. Scheduled to ship January 26, 2010.
Rarity denoted as follows: Common (C), Uncommon (U), Rare (R), Very Rare (VR)
